extendedInfo.description: The best way to create awesome pic collages of your friends, buddy and favorite stars, with doodles, frames, camera filters, stickers and all the photo editing tools you'll ever need!Make cool instant photo Collages using Collage Maker.Start making Instant Collages, adding frames, camera effects and sharing them on instagram using the collage maker for picturesCollage Maker : Pic Stitch- Write on Pictures- Add Frames for photos- Add Stickers on images- Add effects to pictures- Make Collages- Share them on Instagram, Facebook and all other photo sharing appsThis picture collage maker app lets you easily create fun collages from your mobile gallery, Facebook albums or Intsagram picturesFeatures:*** Use simple intuitive touch gestures to adjust, crop, resize, edit and delete snaps.*** Add beautiful Camera Effects. Such as sepia, pixel, flip, emboss etc.*** Edit collage layouts and textures*** Add love frames to collages*** Scribble text or doodle on these images*** Add or remove photos while making collages*** Save and share collages and share them on social networks like Facebook, Instagram, twitter, flickr, etc.Collage Maker is best not just for collage editing but is emotionally a great jointer of memories through the medium of your pics.Add wonderful borders, play with shutter speed, chpphotos, superimpose them together, add a splash of color and retouch with filters and make awesome collages that add joy to your inner kids heart.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This app is amazing its free and works great on mii LG optimus...would recommend everyone to dis awesome app...
reviews.author: Lakresha Rushing

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Osshum app loved it..its so handy nd easy to use...lovely app...keep it up... (y)
reviews.author: Kripa Anand

reviews.title: Excellent and easy
reviews.comment: This app is really nice , for collages it could be better . Worth downloading .
reviews.author: Kamal Tripathi

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Needs more frames, like camo .. and more grid styles would be great, but this app is extremely easy, and fun to use!
reviews.author: sarah walker

reviews.title: Great app im 12 I should know a good
reviews.comment: It is fun fast and easy way to make a collage
reviews.author: hope Sanders

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: I love this collage app so much. Its very easy to use and certainly user friendly!
reviews.author: Branden Trask

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Awesome App. Very practical and easy to use. Love it!.
reviews.author: Terence Bunde Miki

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: Awesome collage maker! Easy to use and fun.
reviews.author: Crystal Savage

reviews.title: Fun way to combine photos
reviews.comment: My friends were posting collage style photos on Facebook and I finally asked how they did it. Found this app in Google play,  & super easy to use!
reviews.author: lynda tatad

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I love it its so useful and I love that you can share it ^.^
reviews.author: Alexa Arteaga

reviews.title: Great !
reviews.comment: Easy and simple to use great app :(
reviews.author: Kelly Llewellyn

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Love to share cool pics w/friends.  This app makes it easy.
reviews.author: ERIKA THURMOND

reviews.title: Worth it (especially since it\'s free!)
reviews.comment: Good app, but like most free apps lots of ads.  Luckily you can simply close the ad without anything attempting to download to your device.
reviews.author: Kimberly Gray

reviews.title: Some reasons
reviews.comment: For some reason it doesn\'t let me do a collage. It just tells me to choose images and after I go to choose the second image the first one is gone :/
reviews.author: Patsy Leyva

reviews.title: Good , easy, simple.
reviews.comment: Its easy to use although it gets stuck sometime
reviews.author: Adlin Suraya Che Jafri

reviews.title: I like it BUT!,
reviews.comment: Therw needa to be more stickers leas kid-ish and be able to adjust the size of the stick.Besidea that I LOVE IT UPDATE PLEASE! :-*
reviews.author: Jennifer Enoch

reviews.title: So far do good
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app. No problems as of yet.   Simple easy fun!
reviews.author: Felicia Robinson

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This works very nice and the pictures made are perfect... Will be better if some more editings added..
reviews.author: Cherukuri Sudhir Raja Chowdhary

reviews.title: Deleted my gallery!
reviews.comment: While making a callage in this app, it froze saying that it was applying effects. Instead it actually deleted hundreds of pictures that I\'ve taken over the past few years. They\'re gone!! Hundreds of pictures I can\'t get back!!
reviews.author: Livio Waits

reviews.title: Super slow...
reviews.comment: After many attempts of trying to apply a filter, couldn\'t even get past that stage. It looked good and I liked the concept but the app would freeze and id have to exit it.
reviews.author: Jennifer Rapkins
